name: unclip
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to unfasten something that is fastened with a clip (= a small metal or plastic object), or to become unfastened: She switched off the engine and unclipped her seatbelt. The cover simply unclips.
More examplesFewer examplesThe minister unclipped his microphone, stood up, and marched out of the interview.There are no screws, so you can just unclip the side panel and you're in.You always have to clip into the next safety wire before unclipping from the one behind you.
